title: How to Find Moltres in Pok√©mon HeartGold and SoulSilver

steps.title: Go to Mount Silver.
steps.content: Go to Mount Silver. To get there, fly to Viridian City and take Route 28.

steps.title: Navigate into the cave.
steps.content: Navigate into the cave. Make sure you have at least 10 Repels. Preferably, Max Repels, since it lasts for 250 steps.

steps.title: Go into the cave, and you will find Moltres.
steps.content: Go into the cave, and you will find Moltres. Make sure you save before battling it, otherwise, you'll have to defeat the Elite 4 again before you get another chance at catching it..
